verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:10
verses.text: And Johanan begat Azariah, (he it is that executed the priest’s office in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem:)

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:11
verses.text: And Azariah begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:12
verses.text: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:13
verses.text: And Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:14
verses.text: And Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:15
verses.text: And Jehozadak went into captivity, when the Lord carried away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:16
verses.text: The sons of Levi; Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:17
verses.text: And these be the names of the sons of Gershom; Libni, and Shimei.
